alert.note: Alert for Abbeville; Anderson (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 09 at 10:14AM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT CENTRAL ELBERT...HART...SOUTHERN ANDERSON AND CENTRAL ABBEVILLE COUNTIES THROUGH 1100 AM EST... At 1014 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Carnesville to 9 miles west of Elberton. Movement was northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Anderson, Elberton, Hartwell, Homeland Park, Northlake, Reed Creek, Due West, Iva, Bowman, and Lake Secession. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
